item.description:
Sourabh kapoor will be organizing this event. I will ask him to post details how to contact later in the day. you can contact me Ananta @ 617-506-9712 or Sourabh @ 972-979-0249.

You can purchase tickets at http://www.aifboston....

About Reach the SKY:

Reach for the Sky’ is a family event that begins with a beautiful ferry ride through Boston Harbor to the island. Once there, you'll have a chance to fly kites as well as indulge in other outdoor activities on the island’s sandy beaches such as Frisbee, volleyball and cricket. We will also have Indian snacks and refreshment provided by a well-known local restaurant (TBA).

All proceeds go towards AIF's Learning & Migration Program (LAMP). LAMP gives children of migrant workers access to continuous primary education, preventing them from dropping out and promoting age-appropriate learning. The program has already reached out to 237,504 children in the migration prone areas of Maharashtra, Gujarat, Andhra Pradesh, Orissa, and Bihar.

Where:
Spectacle Island ,
Boston ,
Massachusetts ,
02045

AIF Boston
Phone : 781-354-4021
item.name: Reach for the sky
